author: Dave Lawler
title: Russian troops seek to encircle Kyiv and "decapitate" government
description: Zelensky said 137 Ukrainian troops had been killed in the first day.
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said Thursday night that 137 Ukrainian soldiers had been killed in the first day of fighting and announced a full military mobilization, with men 1860 barred frâ€¦ [+2610 chars]
